resources.name: resource-scraps
resources.description: Used for buying units, structures, research, and anything else.

resources.name: resource-celestium
resources.description: Used for production. Higher amounts of Celestium allow for quicker production of units, structures, research, and anything else.

resources.name: resource-population
resources.description: Each unit requires a population space, new units can be promoted from the remaining population space. If there are more units than the amount of supported population space, all units will start receiving double damage from all sources.
resources.negativeIncomeDescription: Caution, there are more units than the supported population.

resources.name: resource-weapon-storage
resources.description: Maximum amount of storage for all melee, ranged and special weapons. The most valuable weapons are lost if the maximum storage is decreased for any reason.

resources.name: resource-melee-weapon
resources.description: Weapon used for promotion of units with melee qualities.

resources.name: resource-ranged-weapon
resources.description: Weapon used for promotion of units with ranged qualities.

resources.name: resource-special-weapon
resources.description: Weapon used for promotion of units with special qualities.

resources.name: resource-faith
resources.description: Each point of Faith provides +1 Initiative to all owned units. Faith is generated by Temples.

features.name: feature-shaman-wondrous-goo
features.description: Any unit in this area is contaminated: has its vision and Attack Distance reduced by 3 (total minimum of 1) and receives 1 Pure Damage at the start of its turn.

features.name: feature-pyre-cargo
features.description: The cargo which is attached to Pyre leaves a path of flames when moved, which stay until the start of the next Pyre's action or until death.

features.name: feature-pyre-flames
features.description: Any unit which starts its turn or moves onto the flames receives 5 Melee Damage.

features.name: feature-cannon-heat-up-danger-zone
features.description: This tile will receive massive damage on the next Cannon's turn. Until then, Cannon's owner has vision of this tile.

features.name: feature-radar-resonating-sweep
features.description: These tiles are revealed for Radar's owner until the start of the next planning phase.

features.name: feature-radar-red-dot
features.description: This red dot shows where enemy unit is currently located inside the fog of war.

features.name: feature-vessel-fortification
features.description: Provides +3 Melee Armour and +3 Range Armour to all friendly units until the start of Vessel's action.

features.name: feature-omen-rendition
features.description: 50% of all damage done to this rendition will be done as Pure Damage to the original target.

abilities.name: ability-shared-passive-income
abilities.description: Provides 3 Scraps and 7 Celestium at the start of each planning phase.

abilities.name: ability-shared-scraps-income
abilities.description: At the start of each planning phase provides 5 Scraps.

abilities.name: ability-shared-celestium-income
abilities.description: At the start of each planning phase provides 5 Celestium (-2 for each subsequently constructed Obelisk, total minimum of 1).

abilities.name: ability-shared-uee-power-generator
abilities.description: UEE faction loses if Battery Core is destroyed.

abilities.name: ability-shared-uee-build
abilities.description: Start building a UEE's structure in vision on a tile with Power. Collector and Extractor can be built on tiles without Power.

abilities.name: ability-shared-uee-power-dependency
abilities.description: All abilities get disabled and loses 5 Health at the start of its action or action phase if not connected to Power.

abilities.name: ability-citadel-executive-stash
abilities.description: Provides 4 Population and 4 spaces of storage for Weapons.

abilities.name: ability-citadel-ascendable
abilities.description: Can be navigated through to go up to high ground.

abilities.name: ability-citadel-high-ground
abilities.description: Provides an area of high ground to other units, who all gain +1 vision range and +1 Attack Distance for their ranged attacks.

abilities.name: ability-citadel-promote-goons
abilities.description: Promote a new Revelators goon from the remaining Population.

abilities.name: ability-obelisk-celestium-discharge
abilities.description: Heals all nearby units in 5 Attack Distance by 5 Health. Adjacent units are healed by 15 Health instead and their vision, Melee and Ranged Armour are all reduced by 3 for 3 actions.

abilities.name: ability-shack-accommodation
abilities.description: Provides 2 Population

abilities.name: ability-smith-melee-weapon-production
abilities.description: Every 20 Celestium generates a Melee Weapon and either stores it to an empty Weapon space or waits until there is a free space available.

abilities.name: ability-fletcher-ranged-weapon-production
abilities.description: Every 25 Celestium generates a Ranged Weapon and either stores it to an empty Weapon space or waits until there is a free space available.

abilities.name: ability-alchemy-special-weapon-production
abilities.description: Every 30 Celestium generates a Special Weapon and either stores it to an empty Weapon space or waits until there is a free space available.

abilities.name: ability-depot-weapon-storage
abilities.description: Provides 4 spaces of storage for Weapons which are used for new unit production.

abilities.name: ability-workshop-research

selectionOfResearchToBeUnlocked.name: research-revelators-humanflesh-rations
selectionOfResearchToBeUnlocked.description: Unlock Leap Of Hunger for Mummy.

abilities.description: Open a selection of research available for Revelators to unlock.

abilities.name: ability-outpost-ascendable
abilities.description: Can be navigated through to go up to high ground.

abilities.name: ability-outpost-high-ground
abilities.description: Provides an area of high ground to other units, who all gain +1 vision range and +1 Attack Distance for their ranged attacks.

abilities.name: ability-barricade-protective-shield
abilities.description: Every unit adjacent to the shield of this Barricade receives +2 Range Armour.

abilities.name: ability-barricade-caltrops
abilities.description: Every unit adjacent to the spikes of this Barricade receives 5 Pure Damage at the start of each action phase.

abilities.name: ability-barricade-decompose
abilities.deactivationDescription: Toggle to stop inflicting 15 Pure Damage to itself at the start of each action phase.
abilities.description: Toggle to start inflicting 15 Pure Damage to itself at the start of each action phase.

abilities.name: ability-battery-core-power-grid
abilities.description: Provides Power in 4 Distance.

abilities.name: ability-battery-core-fusion-core-upgrade
abilities.description: Upgrade this Battery Core to Fusion Core.

abilities.name: ability-fusion-core-power-grid
abilities.description: Provides Power in 6 Distance.

abilities.name: ability-fusion-core-defence-protocol
abilities.description: Select an enemy unit in 6 Distance. At the start of the action phase the target receives 3 ranged attacks, each dealing 3 Range Damage.

abilities.name: ability-fusion-core-celestium-core-upgrade
abilities.description: Upgrade this Fusion Core to Celestium Core.

abilities.name: ability-celestium-core-power-grid
abilities.description: Provides Power in 8 Distance.

abilities.name: ability-celestium-core-defence-protocol
abilities.description: Select an enemy unit in 8 Distance. At the start of the action phase the target receives 4 ranged attacks, each dealing 4 Range Damage.

abilities.name: ability-celestium-core-heightened-conductivity
abilities.description: Unlocks Improved Power Grid ability for all Power Poles.

abilities.name: ability-collector-direct-transit-system
abilities.description: Provides +2 Scraps at the start of each planning phase if connected to Power.

abilities.name: ability-extractor-reinforced-infrastructure
abilities.description: Gains additional 3 Melee Armour if connected to Power.

abilities.name: ability-power-pole-power-grid
abilities.description: Provides Power in 4 Distance.

abilities.name: ability-power-pole-excess-distribution
abilities.description: Regenerates +1 Shields to units and structures in 4 Distance at the start of each planning phase.

abilities.name: ability-power-pole-improved-power-grid
abilities.description: Distance of provided Power and shield regeneration is increased to 6.

abilities.name: ability-power-pole-power-grid-improved
abilities.description: Provides Power in 6 Distance.

abilities.name: ability-power-pole-excess-distribution-improved
abilities.description: Regenerates +1 Shields to units and structures in 6 Distance at the start of each planning phase.

abilities.name: ability-temple-keeping-the-faith
abilities.description: Provides +2 Movement to friendly units in 6 Distance at the start of each action phase. Additionally provides +1 Faith. Each point of Faith increases the Initiative of all owned units by 1.

abilities.name: ability-military-base-train
abilities.description: Select a unit to be created at the specified location using Celestium for production.

abilities.name: ability-factory-train
abilities.description: Select a unit to be created at the specified location using Celestium for production.

abilities.name: ability-laboratory-train
abilities.description: Select a unit to be created at the specified location using Celestium for production.

abilities.name: ability-armoury-research
abilities.description: Open a selection of research available for UEE to unlock.

abilities.name: ability-wall-high-ground
abilities.description: Provides an area of high ground to other units, who all gain +1 vision range and +1 Attack Distance for their ranged attacks.

abilities.name: ability-stairs-ascendable
abilities.description: Can be navigated through to go up to high ground.

abilities.name: ability-gate-high-ground
abilities.description: Provides an area of high ground to other units, who all gain +1 vision range and +1 Attack Distance for their ranged attacks.

abilities.name: ability-gate-ascendable
abilities.description: Can be navigated through to go up to high ground.

abilities.name: ability-gate-entrance
abilities.description: Allows movement through for friendly units and blocks it for enemy units.

abilities.name: ability-watchtower-vantage-point
abilities.description: Provides additional +1 vision range and +1 Range Damage to ranged units.

abilities.name: ability-bastion-battlement
abilities.description: Provides additional +1 Range Armour to all units on top.

abilities.name: ability-leader-all-for-one
abilities.description: Revelators faction loses if Leader dies.

abilities.name: ability-leader-menacing-presence
abilities.description: All friendly and enemy units that enter 6 Attack Distance around Leader have their Melee Damage and Ranged Damage reduced by 2 (total minimum of 1).

abilities.name: ability-leader-one-for-all
abilities.description: Select an adjacent Obelisk and sap its energy to give all friendly units +2 Health. This Obelisk cannot be sapped again for 10 turns.

abilities.name: ability-slave-build
abilities.description: Start building a Revelators' structure on an adjacent tile. Multiple Slaves can build the structure, each additional one after the first provides half of the Celestium production to the construction than the previous Slave.

abilities.name: ability-slave-repair
abilities.description: Select an adjacent structure. At the start of the next planning phase the selected structure receives +1 Health. Multiple Slaves can stack their repairs. Repair can be interrupted.

abilities.name: ability-slave-manual-labour
abilities.description: Select an adjacent Hut. At the start of the next planning phase receive +2 Scraps. Maximum of one Slave per Hut.

abilities.name: ability-quickdraw-doubleshot
abilities.description: Ranged attacks twice.

abilities.name: ability-quickdraw-cripple
abilities.description: Each ranged attack cripples the target until the end of their action. During this time target has 60% of their maximum Movement (rounded up) and cannot receive healing from any sources. Multiple attacks on a crippled target have no additional effects.

abilities.name: ability-gorger-fanatic-suicide
abilities.description: Either as an action, or instead of attacking, or upon getting killed Gorger detonates, dealing its Melee Damage to all friendly and enemy units in 1 Attack Distance, killing itself in the process.

abilities.name: ability-camou-silent-assassin
abilities.description: Deals 50% of target's lost Health as bonus Melee Damage if there are no friendly units around Camou in 4 Attack Distance. Additionally, if the target has none of its allies in the same radius, Camou silences the target for 2 of its actions, disabling the use of any abilities or passives.

abilities.name: ability-camou-climb
abilities.description: Select an adjacent unoccupied space on a high ground. This space is considered occupied until the end of the action phase at which point Camou moves to it. Passively, Camou can move down from high ground at the additional cost of 1 Movement.

abilities.name: ability-shaman-wondrous-goo
abilities.description: Select a tile in 4 Attack Distance, which gets contaminated. Any unit in the contamination has its vision and Attack Distance reduced by 3 (total minimum of 1) and receives 1 Pure Damage at the start of its turn. At the end of this action phase, the contamination area expands to adjacent tiles and stays until the end of the next action phase.

abilities.name: ability-pyre-wall-of-flames
abilities.description: The cargo leaves a path of flames when moved, which stay until the start of the next Pyre's action or until death. Any unit which starts its turn or moves onto the flames receives 5 Melee Damage.

abilities.name: ability-pyre-phantom-menace
abilities.description: Can move through enemy units (but not buildings).

abilities.name: ability-big-bad-bull-unleash-the-rage
abilities.description: Select a direction (1 out of 4) originating from Big Bad Bull. Any two adjacent units towards the selected direction suffer Bull's Melee Damage and are pushed one tile farther. If the destination tile is occupied or impassable, the target receives additional 5 Melee Damage.

abilities.name: ability-mummy-spawn-roach
abilities.description: Select an adjacent tile in which Roach is created.

abilities.name: ability-mummy-leap-of-hunger
abilities.description: Roach creation range is increased to 4 Distance.

abilities.name: ability-mummy-spawn-roach-modified
abilities.description: Select a tile in 4 Distance in which Roach is created.

abilities.name: ability-roach-degrading-carapace
abilities.description: At the start of each action loses 1 Health more than the previous action.

abilities.name: ability-roach-corrosive-spit
abilities.description: Perform a ranged attack in 4 Distance dealing 6 (+8 to mechanical) Range Damage.

abilities.name: ability-parasite-paralysing-grasp
abilities.description: Instead of attacking, Parasite attaches to the target. Both units occupy the same space and are considered enemy to all players. Parasite can only detach when the target is killed. All units who attack this combined unit do damage to both. On its turn, Parasite can move the target, using target's Movement. On target's turn, it must execute attack action to any friendly or enemy unit in range, otherwise skip turn.

abilities.name: ability-horrior-expert-formation
abilities.description: Gains +2 Range Armour if at least one other Horrior is adjacent.

abilities.name: ability-horrior-mount
abilities.description: Spend 3 turns mounting (unable to act) and at the start of the fourth planning phase transform into Surfer.

abilities.name: ability-marksman-critical-mark
abilities.description: Each ranged attack marks the target unit. If a friendly non-Marksman unit attacks the marked target, the mark is consumed and the target receives 5 Melee Damage. The mark lasts until the end of the next action phase.

abilities.name: ability-surfer-dismount
abilities.description: Upon death, reemerges as Horrior.

abilities.name: ability-mortar-deadly-ammunition
abilities.description: Each ranged attack consumes 1 ammo out of 2 total. Cannot range attack when out of ammo. Each ranged attack deals full Ranged Damage to all adjacent units around the target.

abilities.name: ability-mortar-reload
abilities.description: Spend this action phase reloading to full ammo.

abilities.name: ability-mortar-piercing-blast
abilities.description: Ranged Armour from the main target is ignored when attacking with Deadly Ammunition.

abilities.name: ability-hawk-tactical-goggles
abilities.description: Gains +3 Vision range.

abilities.name: ability-hawk-leadership
abilities.description: Selected ranged adjacent friendly unit gains +1 Attack Distance. The bonus is lost at the end of the target's next action, or if the targeted unit is no longer adjacent.

abilities.name: ability-hawk-health-kit
abilities.description: Restores 1 Health to all adjacent friendly units at the start of each planning phase.

abilities.name: ability-engineer-assemble-machine
abilities.description: Start building a Machine on an adjacent tile. Multiple Engineers can build the Machine, up to a number needed to operate the Machine. Each Engineer provides current Celestium production to the construction.

abilities.name: ability-engineer-operate
abilities.description: Select an adjacent Machine and start operating it if the Machine is built and does not have the maximum number of operating Engineers already.

abilities.name: ability-engineer-repair
abilities.description: Select an adjacent structure, Machine or Horrior. At the start of the next planning phase the selected structure or Machine receives +2 Health and selected Horrior's mounting time is decreased by 1 turn. Multiple Engineers can stack their repairs. Repair can be interrupted.

abilities.name: ability-cannon-machine
abilities.description: Can be built and operated by Engineers only. The Machine is functional and can act only if maximum number of 3 Engineers are operating it.

abilities.name: ability-cannon-heat-up
abilities.description: Instead of a regular ranged attack, select any tile in Attack Distance. This tile is revealed for allies and highlighted as dangerous for enemies. Instead of the next Cannon's action, the attack is triggered which deals massive Range Damage.

abilities.name: ability-ballista-machine
abilities.description: Can be built and operated by Engineers only. The Machine is functional and can act only if maximum number of 1 Engineer is operating it.

abilities.name: ability-ballista-add-on
abilities.description: Can only be built on a Watchtower or Bastion.

abilities.name: ability-ballista-aim
abilities.description: Spends 1 action aiming, when attacking a new target. A dotted line to the target indicates aiming. The target can stop this process if it moves out of Ballista's Attack Distance. Once aimed, same target can be attacked each action.

abilities.name: ability-radar-machine
abilities.description: Can be built and operated by Engineers only. The Machine is functional and can act only if maximum number of 1 Engineer is operating it.

abilities.name: ability-radar-resonating-sweep
abilities.description: Selected tile in 15 Attack Distance and all adjacent tiles are revealed until the start of the next planning phase.

abilities.name: ability-radar-radio-location
abilities.description: Enemy units in 15 Attack Distance are shown as red dots in the fog of war.

abilities.name: ability-vessel-machine
abilities.description: Can be operated by Engineers only (after it is built from Factory). The Machine is functional and can act only if maximum number of 3 Engineers are operating it.

abilities.name: ability-vessel-absorbent-field
abilities.description: Reduces Melee and Range damage done by 50% to all friendly units in 3 Attack Distance, which is instead dealt to Vessel.

abilities.name: ability-vessel-fortify
abilities.description: Provide +3 Melee Armour and +3 Range Armour to all friendly units in 3 Attack Distance until the start of the next Vessel's action.

abilities.name: ability-omen-rendition
abilities.description: Place a ghostly rendition of a selected enemy unit in 7 Attack Distance to an unoccupied space in a 3 Attack Distance from the selected target. The rendition has the same amount of Health, Melee and Range Armour as the selected target, cannot act, can be attacked and stays for 2 action phases or until the selected target is dead. 50% of all damage done to the rendition is done as Pure Damage to the selected target. If the rendition is destroyed before disappearing, the selected target emits a blast which deals 10 Melee Damage and slows all adjacent enemies by 50% until the end of their next action.

abilities.name: ability-omen-rendition-placement
abilities.description: Select an unoccupied space in a 3 Attack Distance to place the rendition of the selected target.

behaviours.name: behaviour-shared-high-ground-buff
behaviours.description: Unit is on high ground and has +1 vision range and +1 Attack Distance for ranged attacks.

behaviours.name: behaviour-shared-passive-income-income
behaviours.description: Provides 3 Scraps and 7 Celestium at the start of each planning phase.

behaviours.name: behaviour-shared-scraps-income-income
behaviours.description: At the start of each planning phase provides 5 Scraps.

behaviours.name: behaviour-shared-celestium-income-income
behaviours.description: At the start of each planning phase provides 5 Celestium (-2 for each subsequently constructed Obelisk, total minimum of 1).

behaviours.name: behaviour-shared-revelators-building-buildable
behaviours.description: This building can only be placed on the low ground and can be built by multiple Slaves simultaneously.

behaviours.name: behaviour-shared-revelators-no-population-space-intercept-damage
behaviours.description: This unit receives double damage from all sources, because there's not enough population space.

behaviours.name: behaviour-shared-uee-building-buildable
behaviours.description: This building can only be placed on the low ground tiles with Power.

behaviours.name: behaviour-shared-uee-power-generator-buff
behaviours.description: UEE faction loses when this structure is destroyed.

behaviours.name: behaviour-shared-uee-power-dependency-buff
behaviours.description: If this unit is not connected to Power, all abilities get disabled and it loses 5 Health at the start of its action or action phase.

behaviours.name: behaviour-shared-uee-power-dependency-buff-disable
behaviours.description: All abilities are disabled because Power is not supplied.

behaviours.name: behaviour-shared-uee-power-dependency-buff-inactive
behaviours.description: If this unit is not connected to Power, all abilities get disabled and it loses 5 Health at the start of its action or action phase.

behaviours.name: behaviour-shared-uee-positive-faith-buff
behaviours.description: This unit has increased Initiative because of the positive Faith.

behaviours.name: behaviour-citadel-executive-stash-income
behaviours.description: Provides 4 Population and 4 spaces of storage for Weapons.

behaviours.name: behaviour-citadel-ascendable-ascendable
behaviours.description: Can be navigated through to go up to high ground.

behaviours.name: behaviour-citadel-high-ground-high-ground
behaviours.description: Provides an area of high ground to other units, who all gain +1 vision range and +1 Attack Distance for their ranged attacks.

behaviours.name: behaviour-obelisk-celestium-discharge-buff-negative
behaviours.description: This unit has its vision, Melee and Range Armour all reduced by 3 for 3 actions.

behaviours.name: behaviour-shack-accommodation-income
behaviours.description: Provides 2 Population.

behaviours.name: behaviour-smith-melee-weapon-production-income
behaviours.description: Every 20 Celestium generates a Melee Weapon and either stores it to an empty Weapon space or waits until there is a free space available.

behaviours.name: behaviour-fletcher-ranged-weapon-production-income
behaviours.description: Every 25 Celestium generates a Ranged Weapon and either stores it to an empty Weapon space or waits until there is a free space available.

behaviours.name: behaviour-alchemy-special-weapon-production-income
behaviours.description: Every 30 Celestium generates a Special Weapon and either stores it to an empty Weapon space or waits until there is a free space available.

behaviours.name: behaviour-depot-weapon-storage-income
behaviours.description: Provides 4 spaces of storage for Weapons.

behaviours.name: behaviour-outpost-ascendable-ascendable
behaviours.description: Can be navigated through to go up to high ground.

behaviours.name: behaviour-outpost-high-ground-high-ground
behaviours.description: Provides an area of high ground to other units, who all gain +1 vision range and +1 Attack Distance for their ranged attacks.

behaviours.name: behaviour-barricade-protective-shield-buff
behaviours.description: Range Armour for this unit is increased by 2 because of a nearby Barricade's shield.

behaviours.name: behaviour-barricade-decompose-buff
behaviours.description: This Barricade is decomposing and will receive 15 Pure Damage at the start of each action phase.

behaviours.name: behaviour-battery-core-power-grid-mask-provider
behaviours.description: Provides Power in 4 Distance.

behaviours.name: behaviour-collector-building-buildable
behaviours.description: This building can only be placed on the low ground Scraps tiles.

behaviours.name: behaviour-extractor-building-buildable
behaviours.description: This building can only be placed on the low ground Celestium tiles.

behaviours.name: behaviour-wall-building-buildable
behaviours.description: This building can only be placed on the low ground tiles with Power.

behaviours.name: behaviour-fusion-core-power-grid-mask-provider
behaviours.description: Provides Power in 6 Distance.

behaviours.name: behaviour-celestium-core-power-grid-mask-provider
behaviours.description: Provides Power in 8 Distance.

behaviours.name: behaviour-collector-direct-transit-system-inactive-buff
behaviours.description: Will provide +2 Scraps at the start of each planning phase when connected to Power.

behaviours.name: behaviour-collector-direct-transit-system-active-income
behaviours.description: Provides +2 Scraps at the start of each planning phase because it's connected to Power.

behaviours.name: behaviour-extractor-reinforced-infrastructure-inactive-buff
behaviours.description: Will gain additional 3 Melee Armour if connected to Power.

behaviours.name: behaviour-extractor-reinforced-infrastructure-active-buff
behaviours.description: Gains additional 3 Melee Armour because it's connected to Power.

behaviours.name: behaviour-power-pole-power-grid-mask-provider
behaviours.description: Provides Power in 4 Distance.

behaviours.name: behaviour-power-pole-power-grid-improved-mask-provider
behaviours.description: Provides Power in 6 Distance.

behaviours.name: behaviour-temple-keeping-the-faith-buff
behaviours.description: This unit has +2 Movement because of a nearby Temple.

behaviours.name: behaviour-temple-keeping-the-faith-income
behaviours.description: Provides 1 Faith. Each point of Faith increases the Initiative of all of this player units.

behaviours.name: behaviour-wall-high-ground-high-ground
behaviours.description: Provides an area of high ground to other units, who all gain +1 vision range and +1 Attack Distance for their ranged attacks.

behaviours.name: behaviour-stairs-ascendable-ascendable
behaviours.description: Can be navigated through to go up to high ground.

behaviours.name: behaviour-gate-high-ground-high-ground
behaviours.description: Provides an area of high ground to other units, who all gain +1 vision range and +1 Attack Distance for their ranged attacks.

behaviours.name: behaviour-gate-ascendable-ascendable
behaviours.description: Can be navigated through to go up to high ground.

behaviours.name: behaviour-gate-entrance-movement-block
behaviours.description: Allows movement through for friendly units and blocks it for enemy units.

behaviours.name: behaviour-watchtower-vantage-point-buff
behaviours.description: Unit is on a Watchtower and has +1 vision range and +1 Range Damage for ranged attacks.

behaviours.name: behaviour-bastion-battlement-buff
behaviours.description: Unit is on a Bastion and has +1 Range Armour.

behaviours.name: behaviour-leader-all-for-one-buff
behaviours.description: Revelators faction loses when this unit dies.

behaviours.name: behaviour-leader-menacing-presence-buff
behaviours.description: Melee and Range Damage for this unit is reduced by 2.

behaviours.name: behaviour-leader-one-for-all-obelisk-buff
behaviours.description: This unit has recently been sapped for health.

behaviours.name: behaviour-leader-one-for-all-heal-buff
behaviours.description: Heals for 2 Health.

behaviours.name: behaviour-hut-building-buildable
behaviours.description: This building can only be placed on the low ground Scraps tiles, and can be built by multiple Slaves simultaneously.

behaviours.name: behaviour-obelisk-building-buildable
behaviours.description: This building can only be placed on the low ground Celestium tiles, and can be built by multiple Slaves simultaneously.

behaviours.name: behaviour-slave-repair-structure-buff
behaviours.description: This structure will be repaired by +1 Health at the start of the planning phase.

behaviours.name: behaviour-slave-repair-wait
behaviours.description: Currently repairing a structure.

behaviours.name: behaviour-slave-manual-labour-buff
behaviours.description: Slave is working on this Hut to provide +2 Scraps at the start of the planning phase.

behaviours.name: behaviour-slave-manual-labour-wait
behaviours.description: Currently working on a nearby Hut.

behaviours.name: behaviour-quickdraw-doubleshot-extra-attack
behaviours.description: Ranged attacks twice.

behaviours.name: behaviour-quickdraw-cripple-buff
behaviours.description: This unit has only 60% of their maximum Movement (rounded up) and cannot receive healing from any sources until the end of its action.

behaviours.name: behaviour-gorger-fanatic-suicide-buff
behaviours.description: Upon getting killed or executing a melee attack Gorger explodes dealing its Melee Damage to all friendly and enemy units in 1 Distance.

behaviours.name: behaviour-camou-silent-assassin-buff
behaviours.description: This unit is silenced (use of any abilities is disabled).

behaviours.name: behaviour-camou-climb-wait
behaviours.description: Camou will complete climbing on an adjacent high ground space at the end of this action phase.

behaviours.name: behaviour-camou-climb-buff
behaviours.description: Camou can move down from high ground at the additional cost of 1 Movement.

behaviours.name: behaviour-shaman-wondrous-goo-feature-wait
behaviours.description: Effect area will expand at the end of this action phase.

behaviours.name: behaviour-shaman-wondrous-goo-feature-buff
behaviours.description: Effect area will disappear at the end of this action phase.

behaviours.name: behaviour-shaman-wondrous-goo-buff
behaviours.description: Unit has its vision and Attack Distance reduced by 3 (total minimum of 1) and receives 1 Pure Damage at the start of its turn, at which point the effect ends.

behaviours.name: behaviour-pyre-cargo-tether
behaviours.description: The cargo follows Pyre.

behaviours.name: behaviour-pyre-cargo-wall-of-flames-buff
behaviours.description: The cargo leaves a path of flames when moved, which stay until the start of the next Pyre's action or until death. Any unit which starts its turn or moves onto the flames receives 5 Melee Damage.

behaviours.name: behaviour-pyre-phantom-menace-buff
behaviours.description: Pyre can move through enemy units (but not buildings).

behaviours.name: behaviour-roach-degrading-carapace-buff
behaviours.description: Increases periodic damage by 1 at the start of each action.

behaviours.name: behaviour-roach-degrading-carapace-periodic-damage-buff
behaviours.description: This unit will continue to receive 1 damage at every start of its action.

behaviours.name: behaviour-parasite-paralysing-grasp-tether
behaviours.description: This unit is possessed by Parasite. On Parasite turn, it moves both units using the movement speed that the possessed unit has. Any damage received is shared between both.

behaviours.name: behaviour-parasite-paralysing-grasp-buff
behaviours.description: This unit is possessed by Parasite. On its turn, the possessed unit controls the attack which it must do unless there are no legal targets.

behaviours.name: behaviour-parasite-paralysing-grasp-self-buff
behaviours.description: Parasite has possessed the unit on top, gaining its movement speed and the ability to move both units on Parasite's turn.

behaviours.name: behaviour-horrior-expert-formation-buff
behaviours.description: Range Armour for this unit is increased by 2 because it is in formation with an adjacent Horrior.

behaviours.name: behaviour-horrior-mount-wait
behaviours.description: This unit is mounting up to transform into Surfer.

behaviours.name: behaviour-marksman-critical-mark-buff
behaviours.description: Marksman has marked this target until the end of the next action phase. The mark is consumed dealing 5 Melee Damage, when an ally of Marksman attacks this unit.

behaviours.name: behaviour-surfer-dismount-buff
behaviours.description: Upon death, reemerges as Horrior.

behaviours.name: behaviour-mortar-deadly-ammunition-ammunition
behaviours.description: Each ranged attack consumes 1 ammo out of 2 total. Cannot range attack when out of ammo. Each ranged attack deals full Ranged Damage to all adjacent units around the target.

behaviours.name: behaviour-mortar-reload-wait
behaviours.description: Mortar will reload its ammunition at the end of this action.

behaviours.name: behaviour-mortar-piercing-blast-buff
behaviours.description: Ranged Armour from the main target is ignored when attacking with Deadly Ammunition.

behaviours.name: behaviour-hawk-tactical-goggles-buff
behaviours.description: Gains +3 Vision range.

behaviours.name: behaviour-hawk-leadership-buff
behaviours.description: Gains +1 Attack Distance range from nearby Hawk. Bonus will be lost at the end of the next action or if Hawk is not adjacent anymore.

behaviours.name: behaviour-hawk-health-kit-buff
behaviours.description: Restores 1 Health to all adjacent friendly units at the start of each planning phase.

behaviours.name: behaviour-hawk-health-kit-heal-buff
behaviours.description: Heals for 1 Health.

behaviours.name: behaviour-cannon-assembling-buildable
behaviours.description: This machine can only be placed on the low ground and can be assembled by a maximum of 3 Engineers at once.

behaviours.name: behaviour-ballista-assembling-buildable
behaviours.description: This machine can only be placed on a Watchtower or Bastion and can be assembled by a maximum of 1 Engineer at once.

behaviours.name: behaviour-radar-assembling-buildable
behaviours.description: This machine can only be placed on the low ground and can be assembled by a maximum of 1 Engineer at once.

behaviours.name: behaviour-engineer-repair-structure-or-machine-buff
behaviours.description: This structure or machine will be repaired by +2 Health at the start of the planning phase.

behaviours.name: behaviour-engineer-repair-horrior-buff
behaviours.description: This Horrior will have their Mount duration reduced by one turn at the start of the planning phase.

behaviours.name: behaviour-engineer-repair-wait
behaviours.description: Currently repairing.

behaviours.name: behaviour-cannon-machine-counter
behaviours.description: Needs 3 Engineers to operate this machine.

behaviours.name: behaviour-cannon-machine-buff
behaviours.description: This machine is disabled until it is fully operated by the required number of Engineers.

behaviours.name: behaviour-cannon-heat-up-danger-zone-buff
behaviours.description: This tile will receive massive damage on the next Cannon's turn. Until then, Cannon's owner has vision of this tile.

behaviours.name: behaviour-cannon-heat-up-wait
behaviours.description: This Cannon is heating up for a blast at the danger zone.

behaviours.name: behaviour-ballista-machine-counter
behaviours.description: Needs 1 Engineer to operate this machine.

behaviours.name: behaviour-ballista-machine-buff
behaviours.description: This machine is disabled until it is fully operated by the required number of Engineers.

behaviours.name: behaviour-ballista-aim-buff
behaviours.description: This unit is aimed by a Ballista, which allows it to shoot every turn as long as this unit remains in range.

behaviours.name: behaviour-radar-machine-counter
behaviours.description: Needs 1 Engineer to operate this machine.

behaviours.name: behaviour-radar-machine-buff
behaviours.description: This machine is disabled until it is fully operated by the required number of Engineers.

behaviours.name: behaviour-radar-resonating-sweep-buff
behaviours.description: Provides vision to the Radar's owner.

behaviours.name: behaviour-radar-radio-location-feature-buff
behaviours.description: This red dot is able to detect enemy units in the fog of war.

behaviours.name: behaviour-vessel-machine-counter
behaviours.description: Needs 3 Engineers to operate this machine.

behaviours.name: behaviour-vessel-machine-buff
behaviours.description: This machine is disabled until it is fully operated by the required number of Engineers.

behaviours.name: behaviour-vessel-absorbent-field-intercept-damage
behaviours.description: The melee and ranged damage this unit receives is reduced by 50%, but this amount is also dealt to a nearby Vessel.

behaviours.name: behaviour-vessel-fortify-destroy-buff
behaviours.description: Provides +3 Melee Armour and +3 Range Armour to all friendly units until the start of Vessel's action.

behaviours.name: behaviour-vessel-fortify-buff
behaviours.description: Has +3 Melee Armour and +3 Range Armour due to a nearby fortified Vessel

behaviours.name: behaviour-omen-rendition-placement-buff
behaviours.description: This unit is about to have its rendition placed in a 3 Attack Distance.

behaviours.name: behaviour-omen-rendition-intercept-damage
behaviours.description: 50% of any damage dealt will be dealt as Pure Damage to the unit that was the target of this rendition.

behaviours.name: behaviour-omen-rendition-buff-timer
behaviours.description: The rendition stays for 2 action phases and disappears afterwards.

behaviours.name: behaviour-omen-rendition-buff-death
behaviours.description: The unit that was the target of this rendition will emit a blast if this rendition is destroyed. This blast would deal 10 Melee Damage and slow all adjacent enemy units by 50% until the end of their next action.

behaviours.name: behaviour-omen-rendition-buff-death
behaviours.description: This unit is slowed by 50% until the end of its next action.
